## Feature Type

- [ ] Improvement to existing skill
- [ ] New critical brief skill
- [ ] New critic skill (code/architecture/security/etc.)
- [ ] New reference material (questions/red flags/categories)
- [ ] Documentation improvement
- [ ] Other

## Description

Clear description of what you'd like to see.

## Problem It Solves

What problem does this address? Why is it needed?

## Proposed Solution

How would this work? What would the dialogue look like?

## Example Usage

Show an example of how this would be used:

```
User: [example input]
Skill: [example dialogue]
Output: [example brief/analysis]
```

## Alternative Approaches

Are there other ways to solve this?

## Additional Context

Any other relevant information, examples, or references.
